thread.section_title: Park Central Hotel New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very welcoming from the start
thread.title_full: Very welcoming from the start - Review of Park Central Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Kristen I
title: Very welcoming from the start
text: The receptionist was really helpful from the very beginning and added special touches once she learned we were celebrating a 30th and 60th father/son birthday. The bed is the most comfortable bed I've ever slept in! The location is great, near the park and a subway as well as plenty of the main attractions. Thanks!
